1243:13: iha prekṣāpūrvakāriṇaḥ prayojanādiśūnye na kvacitpravartanta ityato'dhikṛtaśāstrasya prayojanādipradarśanena prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyarthamiti|
1243:14: śāstrārthakathanakālopasthitaparasaṃbhāvyamānānupanyāsahetunirākaraṇārthaṃ ca nyāyapraveśakākhyaṃ śāstramārabhyate ityukte saṃbhavatyevaṃvādī paraḥ- nārabdhavyamidaṃ prayojanarahitatvāt unmattakavākyavat|
1243:16: tathā asaṃbaddhatvāt daśa dāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpāḥ kuṇḍamajājinaṃ palalapiṇḍaṃ sara kīṭiketyādivākyavat|
1243:18: ayaṃ cābhidheyaprayojane eva darśayati sākṣāt saṃbandhaṃ tu sāmarthyena|
1243:19: yathā caitadevaṃ tathā sukhapratipattyarthamevameva leśato vyākhyāya darśayiṣyāmaḥ||
1243:22: vyākhyāṃ vihāya tattvajñaiḥ sā coktā padavākyayoḥ||
1243:25: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sābhāsam parasaṃvide pratyakṣam anumānam ca sābhāsam tu ātmasaṃvide iti padāni||
1243:27: sādhyate aneneti siddhirvā sādhayatīti vā sādhanam|
1243:37: nanu vakṣyati sādhanadoṣodbhāvanāni dūṣaṇānīti tadetatkatham| ucyate|
1243:38: sādhanābhāsa eva kiṃcitsāmyena sādhanopacārādadoṣaḥ ityetacca tatraiva nirloṭhayiṣyāmaḥ|
1243:51: parasaṃvide ityatra pare prāśnikāḥ saṃvedanaṃ saṃvid avabodha ityarthaḥ|
1243:52: pareṣāṃ saṃvit parasaṃvit tasyai parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya|
1243:57: sādhanadūṣaṇe eva sābhāse parasaṃvide parāvabodhāya na pratyakṣānumāne|
1243:59: yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ pārthe dhanurdhārayati sati ko'nyo dhanurdhārayati iti||
1243:60: pratyakṣam ityatra akṣamindriyaṃ tataśca pratigatamakṣaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kāryatvenendriyaṃ prati gatamityarthaḥ|
1243:61: idaṃ ca vakṣyati pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍham ityādi|
1243:62: tathā mīyate aneneti mānaṃ paricchedyata ityarthaḥ|
1243:78: ātmā ceha cittacaittasaṃtānarūpaḥ parigṛhyate na tu paraparikalpito nittyatvādidharmā|
1243:82: pratyakṣānumāne eva sābhāse ātmasaṃvide ātmāvabodhāya na sādhanadūṣaṇe ātmasaṃvitphalatvāt tayoḥ|
1243:83: āha nanu sādhanamapi vastuto'numānameva tataścānumānamityādyukte sādhanābhidhānaṃ na yujyate asminvā prāgukte anumānābhidhānamiti|
1243:94: iha ca sādhanādayo'ṣṭau padārthāḥ abhidheyatayā uktāḥ|
1243:114: idamiha śrotaṇāṃ prayojanamuktaṃ kartustarhi kiṃ prayojanamiti vācyam|
1243:133: tatra yathoddeśastathā nirdeśa iti kṛtvā sādhanasvarūpāvadhāraṇāyāha||
1243:136: tatra teṣu sādhanādiṣu sādhanaṃ tāvannirdhāryate iti|
1243:138: atra guṇanimittaṃ sādhanatvena guṇena nirdhāryate iti|
1243:158: na punaryathā lambakarṇaḥ brāhmaṇādayo varṇā iti|
1243:162: na punarādīyate ityādiḥ yathā brāhmaṇādayo varṇā ityadāviti|
1243:163: tataḥ susthitamidaṃ pakṣaḥ ādiryeṣāṃ te pakṣādayaḥ||
1243:167: iha ca yadā sādhyate'neneti sādhanaṃ karaṇābhidhānārthaḥ sādhanaśabdastadā pakṣopalakṣitāni hetutvādivacanāni sādhanam|
1243:169: yadā punarbhāvasādhanaḥ siddhiḥ sādhanamiti tadā pakṣādivacanajanyaṃ pratipādyagataṃ jñānameva sādhanam|
1243:173: yadā tu kartṛsādhanaḥ sādhayatīti sādhanaṃ tadā pakṣādivacanānyeva kartṛtvena vivakṣyante pratipādyasaṃtāne jñānotpādakatvāt iti|
1243:179: uktaṃ ca diṅnāgācāryeṇa sādhanamiti caikavacananirdeśaḥ samastasādhanatvakhyāpanārthaḥ|
1243:182: idaṃ ca na jñāyate kiṃ kārakamuta vyañjakam|
1243:208: ye yathoktāḥ prāśnikāḥ kathaṃ teṣāṃ kaścidapratīto'rtha iti|
1243:212: nanu cātra cāturthyā kriyayā ceti vaktavyalakṣaṇayā bhavitavyaṃ tatkimartha ṣaṣṭhyatrocyate|
1243:227: dharmāḥ kṛtakatvādayaste'sya vidyante iti dharmī śabdādiḥ|
1243:236: iha dharmiṇastāvatprasiddhatā yuktā viśeṣaṇasya tvanityatvāderna yujyate|
1243:241: iha prasiddhatā viśeṣaṇasya na tasminneva dharmiṇi samāśrīyate kiṃtu dharmyantare ghaṭādau|
1243:248: īpsitaḥ abhimataḥ iṣṭa icchāyā vyāpta ityarthaḥ|
1243:249: iha ca viśeṣaṇasya vyavacchedakatvātprasiddho dharmītyanenāprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya pakṣābhāsasya vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ|
1243:250: prasiddhaviśepaṇaviśiṣṭayetyanena tvaprasiddhaviśeṣaṇasya ubhayena cāprasiddhobhayasya svayamityanena cābhyupagamasiddhāntaparigraheṇa sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇasiddhāntānāṃ vyavacchedo draṣṭavyaḥ|
1243:253: etena yadyapi kvacicchāstre sthtiaḥ sādhanamāha tacchāstrakāreṇa tasmindharmiṇyanekadharmābhyupagame'pi yastadā'nena vādinā dharmaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ sa eva sādhyo netara ityuktaṃ bhavatīti yaduktaṃ vādimukhyena tadapi saṃgatameva|
1243:259: ityanena dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣa ityāveditaṃ bhavati|
1243:260: tataśca na dharmamātraṃ na dharmī kevalaḥ na svatantramubhayaṃ na ca tayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ kiṃtu dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva iti bhāvārthaḥ||
1243:261: iha coktalakṣaṇayoge satyapyaśrāvaṇaḥ śabda ityevamādīnāmapi pratyakṣāviruddhānāṃ pakṣatvaprāptyātivyāptirnāma lakṣaṇadoṣaḥ prāpnotītyastannivṛttyarthamāha|
1243:274: trīṇi rūpāṇi yasyāsau trirūpaḥ trisvabhāva ityarthaḥ|
1243:275: ekasya vastuno nānātvamapaśyan pṛcchaka āha kiṃ punastrirūpyam|
1243:279: evaṃ pṛcchakena pṛṣṭaḥ sannāhācāryaḥ pakṣadharmatvaṃ sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣe cāsattvameva|
1243:297: tathā ca satyekāntato vipakṣavyāvṛttāḥ sapakṣaikadeśavyāpino'pi prayatnānantarīyakatvādayaḥ samyagghetava evetyāveditaṃ bhavati||
1243:298: sapakṣe sattvamityādi yaduktaṃ tatra sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ svarūpamajānāno vineyaḥ pṛcchati|
1243:299: kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ ko vā vipakṣa iti|
1243:332: iha ca sādhyapratibandhatvāt sādhanasya tadapi nāstīti gamyate|
1243:342: kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ vā anityādau heturiti yogaḥ|
1243:344: apekṣitaparavyāpāro hi bhāvaḥ svabhāvaniṣpattau kṛtaka iti|
1243:348: tasya prayatnānantaraṃ tatra bhāvo jāta iti vā prayatnānantarīyaḥ|
1243:356: ayaṃ ca hetuḥ kiṃ pakṣadharma eva na tu pakṣasyaiva dharmaḥ|
1243:360: tathā saphala evāstvanyayogavyavacchedaḥ yathā pārtha eva dhanurdharaḥ|
1243:361: anena tu sādhāraṇādīnāṃ navānāmapi hetvābhāsānāṃ vyāvṛttiḥ|
1243:363: yadi sapakṣa evāsti tataśca tadvyatirekeṇānyatra pakṣe'pyabhāvāt dharmatvānupapattiḥ|
1243:367: yadyevaṃ vipakṣe nāsti eveti tṛtīyamavadhāraṇaṃ kimartham ?|
1243:371: anvayavyatirekayorekamapi rūpamuktaṃ kathaṃ nu nāma dvitīyasyākṣepakaṃ syāditi|
1243:382: dve vidhe yasya sa dvividhastadeva dvaividhyam|
1243:384: samāno dharmo yasyāsau sadharmā sadharmaṇo bhāvaḥ sādharmyaṃ tena|
1243:385: visadṛśo dharmo yasyāsau vidharmā vidharmaṇo bhāvaḥ vaidharmyaṃ tena|
1243:391: sapakṣa uktalakṣaṇastasmiṃścāstitvaṃ vidyamānatvaṃ khyāpyate pratipādyate vacanena|
1243:393: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ iti sugamam|
1243:419: na tu bhāvādanyo'bhāvo nāma vastusvarūpo'sti evaṃ nityaśabdenātretyādi dārṣṭāntike'pi bhāvitameva||
1243:430: yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti sapakṣānugamavacanam|
1243:441: tatrāpi pakṣādivacanāni sādhanamiti pakṣasyopalakṣaṇatvātprathamaṃ pakṣa uktaḥ|
1243:457: iha punaḥ pratyakṣaśabdena tatparicchinno dharmaḥ parigṛhyate śālikuḍavanyāyāt|
1243:466: ayaṃ ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi pratyakṣaprasiddhena śrāvaṇatvena virudhyate iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ|
1243:468: śrāvaṇatvaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇatvātpratyakṣagamyameva na bhavati kathaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddhadharmaviruddhaḥ ? iti|
1243:471: atra ca bahu vaktavyaṃ tattu nocyate|
1243:482: vaiśeṣiko'hamityevaṃ pakṣaparigrahaṃ kṛtvā yadā śabdasya nityatvaṃ pratijānite tadāgamavirūddhaḥ|
1243:484: uktaṃ ca buddhimatpūrvā vākyakṛtirvede tadvacanādāmnāyasya prāmāṇyamityādi||
1243:489: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi lokaprasiddhaśucitvena nirākriyata iti|
1243:498: sa ca sādhyamānastatraiva dharmiṇi svavacanaprasiddhena mātṛtvena viruddhyate|
1243:499: virodhaśca mātṛśabdena prasavadharmiṇī vanitocyate vandhyāśabdena tadviparītā|
1243:503: bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati vināśī śabde iti|
1243:510: ayaṃ ca bauddhasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati aprasiddhiviśeṣaṇaḥ|
1243:524: ato dṛṣṭāntaṃ prasādhya prayogaḥ kartavya iti|
1243:527: tathā aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati cetana ātmeti|
1243:531: iti pakṣaḥ sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ prati aprasiddhaviśeṣyaḥ|
1243:542: tathāhi-tantavaḥ paṭasya samacāyikāraṇaṃ tantusaṃyogo'samavāyikāraṇaṃ turīvemādayastu nimittakāraṇam|
1243:547: na tasyātmā viśeṣyaḥ siddho nāpi samavāyikāraṇaṃ viśeṣaṇam|
1243:550: tathā prasiddhasaṃbandho yathā śrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti|
1243:551: prasiddho vādiprativādinoravipratipattyā sthitaḥ saṃbandho dharmadharmilakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ|
1243:562: dharmasvarūpasya nirākaraṇaṃ tattathā mukhamiva mukhaṃ dvāramiti bhāvaḥ|
1243:572: viphalasya bhāvo vaiphalyaṃ sādhanasya vaiphalyaṃ sādhanavaiphalyaṃ tasmātsādhanavaiphalyataḥ|
1243:586: asiddhaḥ sidhyati sa siddhaḥ pratītaḥ na siddhaḥ asiddhaḥ apratītaḥ|
1243:593: anyatarasya vādinaḥ prativādino vā asiddha anyatarāsiddhaḥ||
1243:602: śabdānityatve sādhye anityaḥ śabdaḥ ityetasmin cākṣuṣatvāditi|
1243:605: tathāhi-cākṣuṣatvaṃ na vādinaḥ prasiddhaṃ nāpi prativādinaḥ|
1243:609: vartate kṛtakatvādityayaṃ hetuḥ śabdābhivyaktivādinaṃ mīmāṃsakaṃ kāpilaṃ vā pratyanyatarāsiddhaḥ|
1243:610: tathāhi-na tasya tālvoṣṭhapuṭādibhiḥ kriyate śabdaḥ kiṃtvabhivyajyata iti||
1243:612: bāṣpo jalādiprabhavaḥ sa ādiryasya reṇuvartyādeḥ sa bāṣpādistasya bhāvaḥ sattā tena bāṣpādibhāvena|
1243:613: saṃdihyamānaḥ kimayaṃ dhūma uta bāṣpa uta reṇuvartiriti saṃdehamāpadyamānaḥ|
1243:618: niścito hi dhūmo dhūmatvena hutavahaṃ gamayati nāniścita iti|
1243:624: saṃkhyā parimāṇaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogo vibhāgaḥ śabdeśceti||
1243:629: pañca imāni bhikṣavaḥ saṃjñāmātraṃ saṃvṛtimātraṃ pratijñāmātraṃ vyavahāramātraṃ kalpanāmātram|
1243:631: atītaḥ addhā anāgataḥ addhā pratisaṃkhyānirodhaḥ ākāśaṃ pugdala iti|
1243:632: nanu cānyo'pyasti asiddhaḥ sa ca dvidhā|
1243:655: ṣaṭ prakārā asyeti ṣaṭprakāraḥ ṣaḍ vidhaityarthaḥ||
1243:662: dvayorbahūnāṃ vā yaḥ sāmānyaḥ sa sādhāraṇaḥ|
1243:663: pramīyate iti prameyo jñeya ityarthaḥ tadbhāvaḥ prameyatvaṃ tasmātprameyatvāt pramāṇaparicchedyatvāt|
1243:670: nityaścānityaśca nityānityau nityānityau ca tau pakṣau ca nityānityapakṣau|
1243:675: kiṃ ghaṭavat prameyatvādanityaḥ śabdaḥ āhosvidākāśavat prameyatvānnitya iti prakaṭārthaṃ darśayati|
1243:687: sādhāraṇavilakṣaṇaḥ asādhāraṇaḥ asāmānyaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ san sapakṣavipakṣābhyāṃ vyāvṛtta ityarthaḥ|
1243:693: tatredaṃ śrāvaṇatvaṃ svadharmiṇaṃ vihāya na sapakṣe ākāśādau nāpi vipakṣe ghaṭādau vartata iti saṃśayanimittam|
1243:701: yadasti tena nityena vā bhavitavyamanityena vā nānyathā|
1243:708: yadi tadanyatra nitye vā'nitye vopalabdhaṃ bhavati tatastabdalenetaratrāpi niścayo yujyate nānyathā|
1243:715: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ tasyaikadeśaḥ sapakṣaikadeśaḥ tasminvṛttirasyeti sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ|
1243:716: tathā visadṛśaḥ pakṣo vipakṣastaṃ vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vipakṣavyāpī|
1243:761: upanyastaḥ san tathāvidhārthānirākṛteḥ pratiyoginaṃ na vyabhicaratīti bhāvaḥ|
1243:763: anye tu viruddhaścāsāvavyabhicārī ca viruddhāvyabhicārīti vyācakṣate|
1243:770: anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvādghaṭavaditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte mīmāṃsaka āha|
1243:772: śabdatvaṃ hi nāma veṇuvīṇāmṛdaṅgapaṇavādibhedabhinneṣu sarvaśabdeṣu śabda ityabhinnābhidhānapratyayanibandhanaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasaṃjñitaṃ nityamiti|
1243:774: ekatra dharmiṇi ubhayoḥ kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvayoḥ saṃśayahetutvāt saṃdehahetutvā|
1243:775: tathā caikatra dharmiṇi kṛtakatvaśrāvaṇatvākhyau hetu saṃdehaṃ kurutaḥ kiṃ kṛtakatvādghaṭavadanityaḥ āhosvicchrāvaṇatvācchabdatvavannityaḥ iti|
1243:776: evaṃ saṃdehahetutve pratipādite paraścodayati kiṃ samastayoḥ saṃdehahetutvam uta vyastayoḥ |
1243:788: sa cānenāṃśenā''cāryeṇa bhinna upātta iti tasmādadoṣaḥ|
1243:797: tathā hyayaṃ dharmasvarūpādiviparītasādhanārddharmeṇa dharmiṇā vā virudhyata eveti catuḥprakāraścaturbhedaḥ|
1243:805: tasya svarūpamasādhāraṇāmātmalakṣaṇa dharmasvarūpaṃ tasya viparītasādhana iti samāsaḥ|
1243:808: yathā nitya śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādvā ityayaṃ heturvipakṣa eva bhāvadviruddhaḥ|
1243:814: āha ayamapakṣadharmatvādasiddhānna viśiṣyate kathaṃ viruddha iti ?|
1243:825: dharmaviśeṣaviparītasādhana ityasyodāharaṇaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavat iti|
1243:834: tatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā melakaḥ saṃghātastasya bhāvaḥ saṃghātatvaṃ tasmātsaṃghātatvāt|
1243:839: yathaitadaṅgāni saṃghātatvāddevadattādiparārthāni vartante evaṃ cakṣurādayo'pīti bhāvārthaḥ|
1243:842: ayaṃ hetuḥ saṃghātatvalakṣano yathā yena prakāreṇa pārārthyaṃ parārthabhāvaṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ sādhayati tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa saṃhatatvamapi sāvayavatvamapi parasyātmanaḥ sādhayati|
1243:846: ubhayatreti parārthe saṃhatatve ca avyabhicārād gamakatvādityarthaḥ|
1243:847: tathā caivamapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva saṃhataparārthāścakṣurādayaḥ saṃghātatvāt śayanāsanādyaṅgavaditi|
1243:848: śayanāsaṇādyaṅgāni hi saṃhatasya karacaraṇorugrīvādimata evārthaṃ kurvanti nānyasya|
1243:850: āha vipakṣa eva bhāvādviruddha iti sāmānyaṃ viruddhalakṣaṇaṃ tatkathamihopapadyate ? iti|
1243:852: asaṃhataparavipakṣo hi saṃhata iti tatraiva vṛttidarśanāt|
1243:863: tataḥ pṛthvyāpastejovāyurākāśaṃ kālo digātmā mana iti dravyāṇi|
1243:865: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhiḥ sukhaduḥkhecchādveṣāḥ prayatnaśceti sūtroktāḥ|
1243:866: caśabdāt dravatvaṃ gurutvaṃ saṃskāraḥ sneho dharmādharmau śabdaśceti|
1243:872: tatra paraṃ sattā bhāvo mahāsāmānyamiti cocyate|
1243:881: ekadravyavattvādityatra ekaṃ ca taddravyaṃ ca ekadravyamasyāstīti āśrayabhūtamiti ekadravyavān|
1243:885: vaiśeṣikasya hi adravyaṃ dravyaṃ anekadravyaṃ ca dravyam|
1243:890: ityato dravyalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇatvāt na dravyaṃ bhāva iti|
1243:893: dravyatvaṃ hi navasu dravyeṣu vartamānatvātsāmānyaṃ guṇakarmabhyo vyāvartamānatvādviśeṣaḥ|
1243:895: tataśca sāmānyaṃ ca tadviśeṣaśca sa iti sāmānyaviśeṣastena tulyaṃ vartata iti sāmānyaviśeṣavat|
1243:898: yathā navasu dravyeṣu pratyekaṃ vartamānaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati kiṃtu sāmānyaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ dravyatvameva evaṃ bhāvo'pītyabhiprāyaḥ|
1243:899: āha yadi nāma dravyaṃ na bhavati tathā'pi guṇobhaviṣyati karma ca ityetadapi nirācikīrṣurāha|
1243:901: tataśca na guṇo bhāvaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvād guṇatvavat|
1243:902: yadi ca bhāvo guṇaḥ syānna tarhi guṇeṣu varteta nirguṇatvād guṇānām|
1243:905: tathā na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvātkarmatvavat|
1243:906: yadi ca bhāvaḥ karma syāt na tarhi karmasu varteta niṣkarmakatvātkarmaṇām|
1243:911: ayaṃ ca hetustriprakāro'pi yathā dravyādipratiṣedhaṃ sādhayati tathā bhāvasya dharmiṇo'bhāvatvamapi sādhayati|
1243:917: yatathaidbaktuṃ śakyate na dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat evamidamapi śakyate bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati ekadravyatvāt dravyatvavat|
1243:919: evaṃ na guṇaḥ guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat|
1243:920: atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati guṇeṣu bhāvāt guṇatvavat|
1243:922: evaṃ na karma bhāvaḥ karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat atrāpi bhāvo bhāva eva na bhavati karmasu bhāvāt karmatvavat|
1243:925: āha ayamasiddhānna viśiṣyate iti kathaṃ viruddhaḥ ?|
1243:927: na bhāvo nāma dravyādivyatiriktaḥ kaścidasti saugatānām|
1243:930: kiṃtu paraprasiddho'pi vipakṣamātravyāpī viruddha iti nidarśanārthatvāt|
1243:935: tathāpyanityaḥ śabdaḥ pākyatvādghatavat pākyaḥ śabda iti viruddhapreraṇāyāṃ kṛtakatvānvitāpākyapaṭādidṛṣṭāntāntarasāmarthyāttannivṛttyā na viruddhatā|
1243:942: yata uktaṃ saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu sā sattā|
1243:944: ayameva heturekadravyavattvākhyaḥ asminneva pūrvapakṣe na dravyaṃ bhāva ityādilakṣaṇe asyaiva dharmiṇo bhāvākhyasya yo viśeṣo dharmaḥ satpratyayakartṛtvaṃ nāma tadviparitamasatpratyayakartṛtvamapi sādhayati|
1243:946: tathā hyetadapi vaktuṃ śakyata eva bhāvaḥ satpratyayakartā na bhavati ekadravyavattvādravyatvat|
1243:955: tatra yathā dṛṣṭānto dvividhaḥ evaṃ mūlabhedavyapekṣayā tadābhāso'pi tathā|
1243:962: tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvaddṛṣṭāntābhāsaḥ pañcaprakāraḥ pañcabhedaḥ tadyathā|
1243:967: na tu bahubrīhau niṣṭhāntaṃ pūrvaṃ nipatatīti kṛtvā'siddhasādhanadharmā iti|
1243:970: anye tu sādhanadharmeṇa rahitatvādasiddhaḥ sādhanadharmāsiddhaḥ iti vyācakṣate|
1243:974: sa cāvasaraḥ prāpta eveti yathākramaṃ nirdiśyate|
1243:981: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā paramāṇuriti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvam|
1243:995: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ|
1243:996: buddhau hi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvasti sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ nāsti anityatvādbuddhoriti sūtraprayogaḥ sugama eva|
1243:998: yadamūrtaṃ vastu tannityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā buddhiḥ|
1243:1014: tataśca nityaḥ śabdo'mūrtatvādghaṭavadityatra na sādhyadharmo nityatvalakṣaṇaḥ nāpi sādhanadharmo'mūrtatvalakṣaṇo'sti anityatvānmūrtatvādghaṭasyeti|
1243:1040: yatkṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti vaktavye yadanityaṃ tatkṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti|
1243:1047: yathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādiyatra yadyadanityaṃ tattatprayatnāntarīyakam|
1243:1084: sādharmyadṛṣṭāntābhāseṣvādau sādhanadharmāsiddha uktaḥ iha sādhyāvyāvṛtta iti kimarthamucyate?|
1243:1087: vyatirekastu ubhayavyāvṛttirūpaḥ sādhyābhāve ca hetorabhāva iti|
1243:1111: vinā sādhyasādhananivṛttyā prastutaprayoge yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭamityādilakṣaṇayā|
1243:1115: yathā ghaṭe'nityatvaṃ ca murtatvaṃ ca dṛṣṭamiti|
1243:1119: viparīto viparyasto vyatireka uktalakṣaṇo yasmin sa tathāvidhaḥ|
1243:1122: prastutaprayoga eva tathāvidhasādharmyadṛṣṭāntayukte vyatirekamupadeśayan yadanityaṃ tanmūrtaṃ dṛṣṭa miti vaktavye yanmūrta tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti bravīti|
1243:1127: tathā hyanityaḥ śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādityatra yadaprayatnānantarīyakaṃ tannityamiti|
1243:1139: ātmapratyāyanārthaṃ punaḥ pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca dve eva pramāṇe|
1243:1146: tathāhi bauddhānāṃ dve eva pramāṇe pratyakṣānumāne|
1243:1157: kalpanā vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇā sā apoḍhā apetā yasmāt tat kalpanāpoḍham|
1243:1164: tacca nirviṣayamapi bhavati ata āha arthe viṣaye|
1243:1168: iha yaduktaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamiti tatsvarūpābhidhānata eva vyācaṣṭe nāmajātyādikalpanārahitam|
1243:1179: na hyarthe śabdāḥ anti tadātmāno vā yena tasminpratibhāsamāne te'pi pratibhāserannityādi|
1243:1185: yathendriyasāmarthyājjñānamutpadyate tathā viṣayasāmarthyādapi tatkasmādindriyeṇaiva vyapadeśo na viṣayeṇeti ?|
1243:1191: asādhāraṇena ca loke vyapadeśapravṛttiryathā bherīśabdo yavāṅkura iti|
1243:1195: manovijñānādyapi pratyakṣamityuktaṃ na ca tadanena saṃgṛhītamiti kathaṃ vyāpitā lakṣaṇasya|
1243:1206: agniratra dhūmāt anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāt tadanumānamiti|
1243:1226: savyāpāravatkhyāteḥ pramāṇatvamiti saha vyāpāreṇa viṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇena vartate iti savyāpāram|
1243:1233: viṣayākāraṃ jñānamutpadyamānaṃ viṣayaṃ gṛṇhadevotpadyate iti pratīteḥ grāhakākārasya pramāṇateti|
1243:1234: anye tu saṃścāsau vyāpāraḥ sadvyāpāraḥ pramāṇavyavasthākāritvātsannityucyate|
1243:1235: so'syā vidyata iti sadyāpāravatī śeṣaṃ pūrvavat vyācakṣate|
1243:1240: yajjñānaṃ ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti vā vikalpayataḥ śabdāropitamutpadyate|
1243:1249: hetvābhāso hi bahuprakāra uktaḥ asti vādibhedena|
1243:1250: tasmāt hetvābhāsāt yadanumeye'rthe dharmaviśiṣṭe dharmiṇi jñānam avyutpannasya asiddhādisvarūpānabhijñasya bhavati tadanumānābhāsam|
1243:1265: tasya pratyakṣaviruddhahetvādeḥ prakāśanaṃ prāśnikapratyāyanaṃ na tubhdāvanamātrameva|
1243:1270: abhūtamavidyamānameva tadyataḥ sādhanadoṣaṃ sāmānyanodbhāvayanti prakāśayanti yāni tāni jātidūṣaṇābhāsāni|
